abilities.name: STALL TACTICS
abilities.description: ACTION: Discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: SCHEMING
abilities.description: When you draw 1 or more action cards, draw 1 additional action card. Then, choose and discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: CRAFTY
abilities.description: You can have any number of action cards in your hand. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

flagship.name: Y'sia Y'ssrila
abilities: This ship can move through systems that contain other player's ships.

base.name: Spy Net
base.effect: At the start of your turn: Look at the Yssaril player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.
base.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the Yssaril player.

base.name: Clever Clever Ssruu
base.ability: This card has the text ability of each other player's agent, even if that agent is exhausted.

base.name: So Ata
base.ability: After another player activates a system that contains your units: You may look at that player's action cards, promissory notes, or secret objectives.

base.name: Kyver, Blade and Key
base.ability: ACTION: Each other player shows you 1 action card from their hand. For each player, you may either take that card or force that player to discard 3 random action cards from their hand. Then, purge this card.
